rows.label: qst001102_msg002
rows.name:
What? I asked you to
get some materials?

rows.label: qst001102_msg003
rows.name:
Is that so... My apologies.
At my age, I've decided to
stop dwelling on the past.

rows.label: qst001102_msg004
rows.name:
Anyway, you brought me a
Pione Stone and Gorilla
Hair Bristle (temp)...

rows.label: qst001102_msg005
rows.name:
I have no memory of what
I was trying to make...
but I'll give it a go.

rows.label: qst001102_msg007
rows.name:
I've got it! A brilliant idea to make
something even better from this!

rows.label: qst001102_msg008
rows.name:
If I add a few more materials,
I can create a masterpiece
that is one-of-a-kind!

rows.label: qst001102_msg010
rows.name:
I'll call it ○○○○. You want
to see it, don't you?

rows.label: qst001102_msg011
rows.name:
Could you bring me some Sea
Lizard Scales (temp) and
Seabird Feathers (temp)?

rows.label: qst001102_msg012
rows.name:
You should be able to get
Sea Lizard Scales (temp)
by defeating △△ in ××.

rows.label: qst001102_msg013
rows.name:
You should be able to get
Seabird Feathers (temp)
by defeating ■■ in ××.

rows.label: qst001102_msg014
rows.name:
Hmm, a reliable answer.
I'm counting on you.
